name: MIDNIGHT (itch) (Campalans, mirokshi, Nil Puigdemont)
description:
Your wealthy Uncle Gil, the famous history teacher, collector and curator of the National Museum, writes begging you to come to his mansion to tell you about the latest piece he has acquired: an Egyptian ruby from an ankh cross, rumored to be it is the key to the ritual of eternal life. You haven't heard from him in a long time, so you set off. After a bumpy journey, you arrive at the mansion just before midnight and rush to meet him. You run to his study and you find him dead in his favorite chair, with a knife stuck in his heart and the ruby he told you so much about still in his hand. You pick it up and decide to go outside and ask for help, but the doors are closed now.

CONTROLS

-----------------

WASD or arrow keys for movement

Left click foractions (reading letters, solving puzzles)

Scroll to zoom in/out

Escape to open pause menu
